meaning: dry, parch, ebb, recede, interfere, intercede

onyomiExamples.meaning: participation, taking part in, participating in, being concerned in
everyday garment worn by nobles in ancient Japan, silk dried after having been washed in plain water and stretched out

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to air, to dry, to desiccate, to drain (off), to drink up, to deprive of a role, job, etc.
